message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic deal on this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you showing me this product. I'm interested, but $180 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $110?
Hi Bob, I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I have to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I can offer it to you for $160. What do you think?
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice.  How about we meet in the middle again, at $135?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $135 yet. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I can offer it to you for $155. What do you think?
